divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my boyfriend were sitting on our back porch last night. We seen an obeject in the sky with blue lights. It was making radical movements that were unlike any airplane or helicoper I have ever seen (reversed directions very quickly), it was moving much faster also. The lights on it starting changing from blue to red. It was getting farther and farther away from us, then we seen it shoot streight down. It went behind the trees and we could no longer see it. If we see it again, we will let you know.
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville
There were no other sightings in Louisville on or around March 21st 2011
Summary: Lighted object, too far to tell what shape, lights on it were too bright
